## Summary

- What changed?
- Why was this change needed?
- If user-facing copy/UX changed, how does it align with `docs/DROXY_STYLE_GUIDE.md`?

## Scope

- Branch type: `feature/*`, `fix/*`, or `chore/*`
- One focused outcome (no mixed unrelated work)

## Validation

- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] `node droxy.js --help`
- [ ] `node droxy.js status --json`
- [ ] Docs updated if behavior changed
- [ ] Tone/UX checks done for user-facing copy and prompts
- [ ] `npm pack --dry-run` checked for packaging changes
- [ ] Release/install impact reviewed

## Risk

- Any breaking behavior?
- Any migration or user action required?
